Title: Makes adjustments to the calculation of state aid for East Ramapo central school district for the 2020-2021 school year
Summary: Makes adjustments to the calculation of state aid for East Ramapo central school district for the 2020-2021 school year.
ActClause: AN ACT making adjustments to the calculation of state aid for East Ramapo central school district for the 2020-2021 school year
